Recommended X
Malaria prevention: Intermittent preventive treatment in pregnancy (IPTp)
C.6: In malaria-endemic areas in Africa, intermittent preventive treatment with sulfadoxine-pyrimethamine (IPT p-SP) is recommended for all pregnant women. Dosing should start in the second trimester, and doses should be given at least one month apart,
